resources.name: Search
resources.description:
**Url**

```
/search
```

**Body**

Required fields.

```json
{
  "needle": "[String]",
}
```

**needle**: String that searches for users.username that is a streamer, or tournaments.title of any tournament. The needle string is enclosed in wild characters (%).

resources.name: Login
resources.description:
**Body**

Required fields.

```json
{
  "username": "[String]",
  "password": "[String]"
}
```

**type**: The type of the user.
```
BANNED
GUEST
MEMBER
STREAMER
SUPERADMIN
```

resources.name: Status
resources.description:
**type**: The type of the user.
```
BANNED
GUEST
MEMBER
STREAMER
SUPERADMIN
```

resources.name: Create
resources.description:
**Body**

Required fields.

```json
{
	"title": "[String]",
	"description": "[String]",
	"rules": "[String]",
	"max_teams": [Unsigned Integer, min 2],
	"platform_id": [Unsigned Integer],
	"visible_at": "[YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS]",
	"registration_open_at": "[YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS]",
	"live_at": "[YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS]"
}
```

Optional fields.

```json
{
	"min_elo": [Unsigned Integer, default -1],
	"max_elo": [Unsigned Integer, default -1],
	"entry_level": "[String, default NONE]",
	"prioritize_by_entry_level": [Boolean, default FALSE],
	"check_in_open_at": "[YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS]",
	"twitch_url": "[String]"
}
```

**entry_level**: The entry level of a user that will register and check in. Valid values are:
```
NONE
MINIMUM_FOLLOWER
MINIMUM_SUBSCRIBER
```

resources.name: Update
resources.description:
**Body**

Optional fields.

```json
{
	"title": "[String]",
	"description": "[String]",
	"twitch_url": "[String]",
	"rules": "[String]",
	"max_teams": [Unsigned Integer],
	"entry_level": "[String]",
	"prioritize_by_entry_level": [Boolean],
	"min_elo": [Unsigned Integer],
	"max_elo": [Unsigned Integer],
	"visible_at": "[YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS]",
	"live_at": "[YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS]",
	"registration_open_at": "[YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS]",
	"check_in_open_at": "[YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS]"
}
```

**entry_level**: The entry level of a user that will register and check in. Valid values are:
```
NONE
MINIMUM_FOLLOWER
MINIMUM_SUBSCRIBER
```

resources.name: Index
resources.description:
#### Named parameters
**page:** Integer describing the page number
```
/tournaments?page=[page number]
```

**min_live_at:** Limit data on a minimum date for live_at.
```
/tournaments?min_live_at=2022-01-20
```

**max_live_at:** Limit data on a maximum date for live_at.
```
/tournaments?max_live_at=2022-01-20
```

resources.name: Switch Players
resources.description:
**Body**

Required fields.

```json
{
	"user_ids": [
		[Unsigned Integer],
		[Unsigned Integer]
	]
}
```

**user_ids**: The ids of the two players that should switch places. At least one of the players needs to be in a team. Both players need to be checked in to the tournament.

resources.name: Detach Players from Teams
resources.description:
**Body**

Optional fields.

```json
{
	"user_ids": [
		[Unsigned Integer],
		[Unsigned Integer],
		...
	]
}
```

**user_ids**: Optional array of user ids that should be excluded from the detachment.

resources.name: Index
resources.description:
#### Named parameters
**user_id:** Integer limiting the request to only showing sponsors connected to that user.
```
/sponsors?user_id=[userId]
```

resources.name: Index
resources.description:
**type**: The type of the Support Ticket. Valid values are:
```
UNSPECIFIED
TECHNICAL
BANNED
MISSING_PRICE
```

**priority**: The priority of the Support Ticket. Valid values are:
```
GUEST
USER
SPECIAL_USER
CO_CASTER
STREAMER
ADMIN
```

resources.description:
**Body**

Optional fields.

```json
{
  "esportal_username": "[String]",
  "type": "[String]"
}
```

**esportal_username**: The username to be found on ESPortal. If the username is already taken by another user, a 422 status is returned. If the user is not found on ESPortal, a 422 status is returned.

**type**: The type of the user.
```
BANNED
GUEST
MEMBER
STREAMER
SUPERADMIN
```

resources.name: Registered and Checked In tournament ids
Status by tournament
resources.description:
**state**: The state of the application to the tournament.
```
CHECKED_IN_KICKED
REGISTERED_KICKED
REGISTERED
CHECKED_IN
UNDEFINED
```

**caster**: The type of caster to the tournament.
```
MAIN_CASTER
CO_CASTER
OWNER
UNDEFINED
```

resources.name: Status all tournaments
resources.description:
**state**: The state of the application to the tournament.
```
CHECKED_IN_KICKED
REGISTERED_KICKED
REGISTERED
CHECKED_IN
UNDEFINED
```

**caster**: The type of caster to the tournament.
```
MAIN_CASTER
CO_CASTER
OWNER
UNDEFINED
```

resources.name: Check Twitch Subscriber
resources.description:
#### Named parameters
**twitch_login:** The twitch login of the streamer, of which to check whether the logged in user is a subscriber of.
```
/users/1/check_twitch_subscriber?twitch_login=pg_cs
```

**twitch_id:** The twitch id of the streamer, of which to check whether the logged in user is a subscriber of.
```
/users/1/check_twitch_subscriber?twitch_id=156468535
```

**user_id:** The user id of the streamer, of which to check whether the logged in user is a subscriber of.
```
/users/1/check_twitch_subscriber?user_id=2
```

### Responses

**Missing scope:** The logged in user has not connected their twitch to Subwars API.
```json
{
	"error": "Unauthorized",
	"status": 401,
	"message": "Missing scope: user:read:subscriptions or user_subscriptions"
}
```

**Not subscriber:** The logged in user is not a subscriber to the requested streamer.
```json
{
	"error": "Not Found",
	"status": 404,
	"message": "37264990 has no subscriptions to 118368288"
}
```

**Streamer not found:** The streamer was not found.
```json
{
	"error": "Not Found",
	"status": 404,
	"message": "The streamer was not found on Twitch"
}
```

**Bad OAuth token:** The Subwars API has a bad OAuth token towards Twitch. Insert correct token in Environment.
```json
{
	"error": "Unauthorized",
	"status": 401,
	"message": "Invalid OAuth token"
}
```

resources.name: Twitch Get Signed Route
resources.description:
#### Named parameters
**client_callback:** A URL saying where to redirect the user after the authorization flow is complete towards twitch.
```
/twitch_signed_route?client_callback=http://localhost:3000
```
